original_text: “‘I am the Lord your God, who brought you out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of slavery.
korean_text: 나는 너를 애굽 땅, 종 되었던 집에서 인도하여 낸 네 하나님 여호와라

sentences.original_text: who brought you out of the land of Egypt,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 낸 자이며,

sentences.original_text: out of the house of slavery.
